description: Adversaries may  modify system firewalls in order to bypass controls limiting network usage
author: frack113
name: Netsh Allow Group Policy on Microsoft Defender Firewall
query: (process.executable.text:*\\netsh.exe AND process.command_line.text:*advfirewall* AND process.command_line.text:*firewall* AND process.command_line.text:*set* AND process.command_line.text:*rule* AND process.command_line.text:*group\=* AND process.command_line.text:*new* AND process.command_line.text:*enable\=Yes*)
